text: TelevisaUnivision is a Miami-based"Contact." Univision. Retrieved on August 28, 2011. "605 Third Avenue, 12th Floor New York, NY 10158" Mexican-American media conglomerate, founded on January 31, 2022. It was founded after the merger of Univision Communications and Televisa (communications/production), to become the largest media company in Latin America. == References == == Other websites == * Univision website * TelevisaUnivision Corporate website Category:2022 establishments in the United States Category:1962 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in Miami Category:Mass media in North America Category:American entertainment companies Category:1960s establishments in Florida
